executable.title: DTI Lesion Track
executable.description: This CLI module aims to segment abnormalities voxels from diffusion fractional anisotropy (FA) maps. This tool could be applied to the study of Multiple Sclerosis or other neurodegenerative diseases that affects the brain white matter.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos da S. Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CNPq grant 201871/2015-7/SWE and CAPES.
